Reference

Creating `dm` objects and basic functions

dm() dm_from_src() new_dm() validate_dm() dm_get_src() dm_get_con() dm_get_tables() is_dm() as_dm()

Data model class

dm_paste()

Reverse engineer code for creation of a dm

Managing the tables of a `dm`

dm_add_tbl()

Add tables to a dm

dm_rm_tbl()

Remove tables from a dm

dm_select_tbl() dm_rename_tbl()

Select and rename tables

pull_tbl()

Retrieve a table from a dm or a zoomed_dm

Primary keys

dm_add_pk() dm_rm_pk()

Add/remove a primary key to/from a table in a dm object

dm_has_pk()

Does a table of a dm object have columns set as primary key?

dm_get_pk()

Retrieve the name of the primary key columns of a dm table

dm_get_all_pks()

Get all primary keys of a dm object

enum_pk_candidates() dm_enum_pk_candidates()

Which columns are candidates for a primary key column?

Foreign keys

dm_add_fk() dm_rm_fk()

Add/remove references from one table of a dm to another

dm_has_fk()

Does a reference exist?

dm_get_fk()

Retrieve the names of the columns marked as a foreign key, pointing from one table of a dm to another table.

dm_get_all_fks()

Retrieve all foreign key constraints in a dm

dm_enum_fk_candidates() enum_fk_candidates()

Find foreign key candidates in a table

dm_is_referenced()

Is a table of a dm referenced by another table?

dm_get_referencing_tables()

Get the names of the tables of a dm that reference a given table.

Visualization

dm_draw() dm_set_colors() dm_get_colors() dm_get_available_colors()

Draw a diagram of a dm-object's data model

Zooming to a table of a `dm`

dm_zoom_to() dm_insert_zoomed() dm_update_zoomed() dm_discard_zoomed()

Single out a table of a dm

Flattening

dm_flatten_to_tbl() dm_squash_to_tbl()

Flatten a part of a dm into a wide table

dm_join_to_tbl()

Perform a join between two tables of a dm

dm_disambiguate_cols()

Avoid conflicts in column names

Rename or select columns of tables in a `dm`

dm_rename()

Rename one or more columns of a dm table

dm_select()

Select and/or rename one or more columns of a dm table

Filtering

dm_filter() dm_apply_filters() dm_apply_filters_to_tbl()

Filtering a dm object

Interaction with DBs

copy_dm_to()

Copy a dm-object to a different data source

dm_learn_from_db()

Learn a dm object from a database (DB)

Table surgery

decompose_table()

Decompose a table into two linked tables

reunite_parent_child() reunite_parent_child_from_list()

Merge two tables that are linked by a foreign key relation

Check keys and cardinalities

dm_examine_constraints()

Validate your dm: are all key constraints met?

check_cardinality_0_n() check_cardinality_1_n() check_cardinality_1_1() check_cardinality_0_1() examine_cardinality()

Test if the relation between two tables of a data model meet the requirements

check_key()

Test if a column (combination) is unique key of a table

check_subset()

Test if the values of one column are a subset of the values of another column

check_set_equality()

Test if the value sets of two different columns in two different tables are the same

Miscellaneous

dm_nycflights13()

Creates a dm object for the nycflights13 data

dm_nrow()

Number of rows
